message: Fair and simple, let's start with a clean slate!
I'll give you a bit less, but I still want to be the majority shareholder!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up my majority stake so easily!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile!
I'm not going to give up my majority stake without a fight! You'll have to do better than that!
I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to give you a smaller share if you're not willing to meet me in the middle!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'm not going to let you walk all over me. I want a bigger share!
I'm not going to be taken advantage of! I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm taking the majority!
You're really trying to lowball me, Bob! I'm not going to let you get away with it. I want a fair share!
I'm not going to give you anything! You'll get a tiny fraction, and I'll take the rest!
You're really trying to squeeze me dry, Bob! I'm not going to let you get away with it. I want a fair share!
I'm not leaving without getting everything! You'll get a tiny crumb, and I'll take the rest!
